parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "Spack",
  "details": {
    "scheduler": "Slurm",
    "job_name": "hypre@2.23.0",
    "account": "use300",
    "partition": "ind-gpu-shared",
    "nodes": 1,
    "tasks_per_node": 1,
    "cpus_per_task": 10,
    "memory": "93G",
    "gpus": 1,
    "time": "00:30:00",
    "system_name": "expanse",
    "spack_version": "0.17.3",
    "spack_instance_name": "gpu",
    "spack_instance_dir": "${HOME}/cm/shared/apps/spack/${SPACK_VERSION}/${SPACK_INSTANCE_NAME}",
    "intel_license_file": "40000@elprado.sdsc.edu:40200@elprado.sdsc.edu",
    "spack_package": "hypre@2.23.0",
    "spack_compiler": "intel@19.1.1.217",
    "spack_variants": "~complex +cuda cuda_arch=70,80 ~debug +fortran ~int64 ~internal-superlu ~mixedint ~mpi ~openmp +shared ~superlu-dist ~unified-memory",
    "spack_dependencies": "^cuda@11.2.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cuda@11.2.2 % intel@19.1.1.217) ^intel-mkl@2020.4.304/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' intel-mkl@2020.4.304 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none)",
    "spack_spec": "${SPACK_PACKAGE} % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ${SPACK_VARIANTS} ${SPACK_DEPENDENCIES}",
    "dependencies": {
      "cuda": "11.2.2",
      "intel-mkl": "2020.4.304"
    },
    "next_job": "suite-sparse@5.10.1.sh"
  }
}
```

This script uses Spack, a package manager for scientific software, to install and configure the Hypre library, version 2.23.0. It utilizes the Intel compiler version 19.1.1.217 and leverages Slurm for resource allocation and job scheduling. The script specifies various configuration options and dependencies, including CUDA, Intel MKL, and MPI, to ensure the Hypre library is built and linked correctly. It then launches a subsequent job, "suite-sparse@5.10.1.sh," after Hypre is successfully installed.
